column5: I am looking for somone to Tape and Mud a Basement Reno.  I hung the Board but would like to Hire (Cash$$$) Someone to do the Taping and Mudding.  Any recommendations????   Thanks Rick
Too bad your so far away from me. Id do it for ya. Perhaps if waleye were open or bass but.......
I wont be your mudder but I can be your father if it helps.   Art
Thanks  Fellas!!  Skud PM sent!!!  So far still looking!!!  Rick
I was going to say contact Doug.Good guy and does good work.
Hey Brian   Skud???  and Doug!!!  Same Guy????   Rick
Brian  Good Guy!!!  and Does Good Work!!!   Exactly what I'm looking for!!!   Rick
